InstructionData.Title: autoTrader

InstructionData.Instructions:
alias selectionDial d0 alias antenna d1
alias currFilter r0 alias prevLine r1 alias wattsReaching r3 alias wattsNeeded r4
define noFilt -1 #disables filters define oreTr -1374574351 #ore 0 define alloyTr 54412100 #alloy 1 define foodTr -82964957 #food 2 define seedTr -1077922067 #seed 3 define gasTr -470575659 #gas 4 define constructTr 175935584 #construction 5 define liquidTr 135244511 #liquid 6 define hardwTr 1325142661 #hardware 7 define consumTr -1650376125 #consumables 8 define appliTr -1590718013 #appliances 9
setFilter: l currFilter selectionDial Setting brgt currFilter 0 3 s antenna BestContactFilter -1 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 1 3 s antenna BestContactFilter -1374574351 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 2 3 s antenna BestContactFilter 54412100 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 3 3 s antenna BestContactFilter -82964957 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 4 3 s antenna BestContactFilter -1077922067 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 5 3 s antenna BestContactFilter -470575659 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 6 3 s antenna BestContactFilter 175935584 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 7 3 s antenna BestContactFilter 135244511 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 8 3 s antenna BestContactFilter 1325142661 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 9 3 s antenna BestContactFilter -1650376125 j finishFilter brgt currFilter 10 3 s antenna BestContactFilter -1590718013 j finishFilter finishFilter: j prevLine
